mapper.insert: insert into commodity values (user_id, commodity_name, commodity_type, price, commodity_address, commodity_description, cover_url), (#{userId}, #{commodityName}, #{commodityType}, #{price}, #{commodityDescription}, #{commodityAddress}, #{coverUrl});
mapper.select: select id,user_id,commodity_name, commodity_type, price, commodity_description, commodity_address, cover_url, commodity_status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from commodity where id = #{commodityId}
